pageContent: Introduction: To characterize patient reported outcomes for urinary and sexual function using International Prostate Symptom Score (IPSS) and Sexual Health Inventory for Men (SHIM) comparing intensity modulated radiation therapy (IMRT), low dose rate brachytherapy (LDR), post-prostatectomy IMRT (PPRT), and radical prostatectomy (RP).

metaData.source:
Sexuality in men after prostate cancer surgery: a qualitative interview study
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/27074959/
